H0.text: What country did the Reagan administration illegally sell arms to. South Africa

H1.text: What country did the Reagan administration illegally sell arms to. Israel

H2.text: What country did the Reagan administration illegally sell arms to. Saudi Arabia

H3.text: What country did the Reagan administration illegally sell arms to. Irān

A4.text: The following arms were supplied to Iran: 20 August 1985 – 96 TOW antitank missiles.

A5.text: Israel sent 96 US-made TOW missiles to Iran through an arms dealer Manucher Ghorbanifar.
